Xingtai Airport, Xingtai, China [ XNT / ]

If you are planning to travel to Xingtai or any other city in China, this airport locator will be a very useful tool. This page gives complete information about the Xingtai Airport along with the airport location map, Time Zone, lattitude and longitude, Current time and date, hotels near the airport etc... Xingtai Airport Map showing the location of this airport in China. Xingtai Airport IATA Code, ICAO Code, exchange rate etc... is also provided.

Xingtai Airport Info:

Xingtai Airport IATA Code: XNT Xingtai Airport ICAO Code: Latitude : 37.0719 Longitude : 114.484 City : Xingtai Country : China World Area Code : 713 Airport Type : Small Timezone : Asia/Harbin Xingtai Airport Timezone : GMT +08:00 hours Current time and date at Xingtai Airport is 13:43:53 PM (CST) on Saturday, Aug 10, 2024
